structure.title: Career Objective
structure.summary: The partial document is a professional resume of Harsh Redasani highlighting his career objective to become a Software Developer and contribute to software design, development, and optimization. It includes his educational background, technical skills, projects, achievements, co-curricular activities, and soft skills. The resume emphasizes strong problem-solving abilities, interest in new technologies, and a solid foundation in computer science.

structure.title: Education
structure.summary: This section outlines Harsh Redasani’s academic background. He is pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology (2023–2027) from Dwarkadas Jivanlal Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai. He completed his Higher Secondary Education (Science) from Vidya Vikas Jr College, Malkapur (2021–2023). The education section reflects a strong foundation in technical and analytical subjects.

nodes.title: Dwarkadas Jivanlal Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai
nodes.summary: Currently pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology (2023–2027), focusing on software development, data structures, algorithms, database systems, and modern computing technologies.

nodes.title: Vidya Vikas Jr College, Malkapur
nodes.summary: Completed Higher Secondary Examination (Science) during 2021–2023, building a strong academic base in mathematics and science subjects.

structure.title: Technical Skills
structure.summary: Harsh possesses technical proficiency in multiple programming languages including Java, Python, C/C++, SQL, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS. He has experience in data analysis using Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and MS Excel (Pivot Tables, Lookups, Aggregation). His web development skills include frontend technologies and basic ReactJS. He is familiar with tools such as Git, GitHub, Tableau, Google Data Studio, and VS Code. He has knowledge of PostgreSQL and MySQL databases and core computer science concepts like DSA, OOPs, database design, debugging, and API integration.

structure.title: Projects
structure.summary: This section highlights Harsh’s hands-on project experience in software development, data analysis, AI, and web development. His projects demonstrate practical implementation skills, validation mechanisms, dashboard creation, AI-based problem solving, and responsive web design.

nodes.title: BigBaar Daily Sales Tracker | Python, Excel
nodes.summary: Developed a sales tracking and reporting system with validation and aggregation features. Implemented data analysis techniques to generate structured reports and insights for daily sales monitoring.

nodes.title: Speech Correction App | Flutter, Python, Firebase
nodes.summary: Built an AI-powered speech disorder detection application integrated with dashboards. Utilized Flutter for frontend, Python for AI model logic, and Firebase for backend data storage and authentication.

nodes.title: Amazon Clone Website | HTML, CSS, JavaScript
nodes.summary: Designed and developed a responsive e-commerce storefront featuring product categories, cart functionality, and order summary system using core frontend technologies.

structure.title: Achievements
structure.summary: Harsh solved 100+ LeetCode problems focused on Data Structures and Algorithms through Striver’s Sheet. He completed a DSA course by Apna College with certification and participated in a Scaler AI/ML Workshop to explore real-world machine learning applications.

structure.title: Co-Curricular Activities
structure.summary: Completed Data Structures and Algorithms course by Apna College and actively solving Striver’s DSA Sheet to enhance algorithmic thinking. Completed online courses in JavaScript, Python (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib), and Excel through platforms like Apna College and Chai Aur Code. Attended Web Development and AI/ML workshops conducted by Scaler School of Technology.

structure.title: Soft Skills
structure.summary: Harsh demonstrates strong adaptability, problem-solving skills, analytical thinking, collaboration abilities, and effective communication skills, enabling him to work efficiently in team-based and dynamic environments.
